data.oai_dc:dc: Planktic foraminifera distribution of sediment core 75KS52

75KS52, Climatic Variability of the Mediterranean Paleo-circulation, CLIVAMP, Counting >150 µm fraction, DEPTH, sediment/rock, Globigerina bulloides, Globigerinella siphonifera, Globigerinita glutinata, Globigerinoides ruber, Globigerinoides ruber white, Globigerinoides sacculifer, Globorotalia inflata, Globorotalia scitula, Globorotalia truncatulinoides, Le Suroît, Medor75, Neogloboquadrina eggeri, Neogloboquadrina pachyderma, Neogloboquadrina pachyderma dextral, Neogloboquadrina pachyderma sinistral, Neogloboquadrina sp., Orbulina universa, PC, Piston corer, SESAME, Southern European Seas: Assessing and Modelling Ecosystem Changes, South Levantine Basin, Sprudts, warm water species, Turborotalita quinqueloba
